resources.string:
Midwest nice. We’re proud of it. You know, like that two-finger wave people exchange when they drive by, well, everyone. And what better way to share that flyover-state love than by turning a friend’s refrigerator (or your own) into a mosaic of casserole/hotdish delicacies — yeah, we’ll keep brainstorming bacon T-shirt ideas to avoid that argument.
Whether you’re craving the artery-clogging comfort of deep-fried everything or are flabbergasted by your (now-former) friend’s unfamiliarity with the “walking taco,” Mmmidwest takes you on a culinary journey through the finest in “just-add-soup” cuisine, beer, cheese and obviously, more bacon.
We’re all about comfort food in the Midwest and really, what’s more comforting than family members convincing you to eat that second helping of tater-tot casserole?
Forget those practically microscopic dishes plated on square, immaculate dinnerware. Trade plates for your very own bag of Doritos, per the walking taco. Eat everything on a stick and remember, with perseverance, you can deep-fry anything.
